scenario_text.value: Yo, Takumaaa! We finally found you!

Minoru, Falcomon! Glad to see you safe and
sound!

Who’s safe and sound?! I just saw a vision
that made me wanna scratch my eyes out!

I’ll teach you to play tricks on me! Let’s
go, Falcomon!

(What? More enemies?! We’re gonna have to
regroup...)
